sourcesContent:
Whoami

Hi, my name is Jip Derksen and I'm a {{ age }} year old software engineering student at the Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences.

Coding Skills

  • rocket {{ skill }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.css'] }) export class AboutComponent implements OnInit { age: number; skills: string[]; constructor() { let timeDiff = new Date().getTime() - new Date("2003-01-06").getTime(); this.age = Math.floor((timeDiff / (1000 * 3600 * 24))/365); this.skills = [ "Java", "Python", "Angular", "Spring Boot", "Docker", "Algorithms and Data Structures", "Object Oriented Programming", "REST APIs", "ViM", ]; } ngOnInit(): void { } }
